title: Perfect Pati
overview: Set in Rajasthan, the story revolves around Vidhita who marries Pushkar Rathod, a menacing rich man, and soon realises that her husband is not the perfect partner that she was expecting. When her life goes through many ups and down, her progressive mother-in-law, Rajyashree Rathod, comes to her rescue. Enjoy this pathbreaking television series that raises the question of whether an ideal son can also be an ideal husband?
